item.title: Custom datatable Tooltips in Shiny
item.description: Tooltips If you’ve used a web browser or a programming IDE, you’ve almost certainly come across a tooltip. While tooltips can serve to clarify information in a webpage, natively they also obscure it. These bubbles of information require a user to hover over an element to see the tooltip and get the information. A user might not be aware that this information exists or users using screen-readers might never come across this tooltip.
